item.title: Using Disqus without any plugins
item.description: At TurnGeek we recently had the task to include Disqus (which is great by the way) into our site, so readers of our books can leave comments for each chapter. For a couple of reasons we couldn’t use their Wordpress plugin although the site is running on Wordpress.
